papers.title: Smart Textile Display with Addressable Quantum Dot Light-Emitting Diodes
papers.abstract_snippet: We report a fully addressable smart textile display using quantum dot light-emitting diodes (QD-LEDs) featuring a highly durable electrode. The key innovation lies in the development of an ultrathin oxide/metal hybrid structure for the durable electrode, which achieves mechanical bending durability surpassing the indium tin oxide (ITO) electrode.
papers.relevance_explanation_from_llm: Demonstrates advancements in flexible quantum dot display technology through textile integration.

papers.title: Recent Advances in Light Outcoupling from Quantum-Dot Light-Emitting Diodes
papers.abstract_snippet: This Perspective discusses recent cornerstones and major challenges in outcoupling technologies for QLEDs, particularly those based on microcavity structures.
papers.relevance_explanation_from_llm: Analyzes critical optical engineering challenges for improving QLED display efficiency.

papers.title: Simple and Rapid Synthesis of Blue, Green, and Red Fluorescent Carbon Quantum Dots for LED Displays
papers.abstract_snippet: Introduces carbon quantum dots (CQDs) as eco-friendly alternatives for LED fabrication, demonstrating size-dependent emission properties.
papers.relevance_explanation_from_llm: Provides educational framework for quantum dot material synthesis relevant to display applications.

papers.title: Elucidating the Impact of Electron Accumulation in Quantum-Dot Light-Emitting Diodes
papers.abstract_snippet: Examines how electron accumulation affects QLED efficiency through analysis of 186 devices with varying quantum yields.
papers.relevance_explanation_from_llm: Addresses fundamental charge management challenges in QLED display performance optimization.

papers.title: Color Revolution: Prospects and Challenges of Quantum-Dot Light-Emitting Diode Display Technologies
papers.abstract_snippet: Comprehensive review of QLED industrialization challenges including device mechanisms, blue emitter development, and patterning processes.
papers.relevance_explanation_from_llm: Synthesizes key technical barriers and research directions for commercial QLED display adoption.
